## TokenTransfer.numDecimals property

Legacy field. The number of decimals is not a concern of "sdk-core". For formatting and parsing amounts, use "sdk-dapp" or "bignumber.js" directly.

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly numDecimals: number;
```
